aggs.histogram: select histogram(_timestamp, '30 second') AS zo_sql_key, count(*) AS zo_sql_num from query GROUP BY zo_sql_key ORDER BY zo_sql_key

HttpResponse.description:
HTTP response
code 200 is success
code 400 is error
code 404 is not found
code 500 is internal server error
code 503 is service unavailable
code >= 1000 is custom error code
message is the message or error message
